sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
rises
ali
rises up
, se premakne navzgor.

seg.quote: Clouds of birds rose from the tree-tops.
He could see the smoke from his bonfire rising up in a white column.

sense.def:
To rise
pomeni vstati iz sedečega ali ležečega položaja;

seg.quote: Dr Willoughby rose to greet him.

sense.def:
To rise
pomeni tudi spraviti se iz postelje.

seg.quote: They had risen at dawn.

sense.def:
Kadar sonce ali luna
rises
, se pokaže na obzorju.

Kadar pokrajina
rises
, postaja vedno višja.

seg.quote: He followed Jack towards the castle where the ground rose slightly.
The house was built on rising ground.

sense.def:
Kadar zvok
rises
, postaja vedno glasnejši.

seg.quote: His voice rose to a shriek.

sense.def:
Kadar zvok
rises from a group of people
, se zasliši iz skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: A loud gasp rose from the boys.

sense.def:
Kadar količina
rises
, postaja vedno večja.

seg.quote: Prices rose by more than 10%.
The temperature began to rise.
...the rising rate of inflation.

sense.def:
A rise in the amount of something
je povečanje količine nečesa.

seg.quote: ...the rise in crime.
...price rises.
...a pay rise of about £20 a week.

sense.def:
To rise to a challenge or remark
pomeni, da izziva ali pripombe ne prezremo, ampak se odzovemo nanjo.

Kadar ljudje v neki državi
rise up
, se začnejo bojevati proti tistim, ki so v njej na oblasti.

seg.quote: The settlers rose in revolt.
...a big peasant rising.

sense.def:
To rise to a higher position or status
pomeni doseči višji položaj v službi ali družbi, postati pomembnejši, uspešnejši ali vplivnejši.

seg.quote: Bergson rose rapidly to fame.

sense.def:
One's rise
je pridobivanje vedno večjega pomena, uspeha ali vpliva.

seg.quote: ...the decline of the Liberal Party and the rise of Labour.
...his rise to fame.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
gives rise to an event or situation
, pripelje do določenega dogodka ali razmer.

seg.quote: This breakthrough could give rise to ethical problems.

sense.def:
To rise above a problem
pomeni ne dovoliti, da neka težava vpliva na nas.

seg.quote: She was in continual pain, but rose above it.
